LegacyMigration.Title: Database Migration
LegacyMigration.Subtitle: Migrate the old version v0 database to this.
LegacyMigration.Pick: Please select the database file from the older version:

Loading.Title: Migrating...
Loading.Body: Do not exit the application and wait for the migration to complete.

Language.Title: Language
Language.Subtitle: Change the primary language used by the application.

Namespace.Title: Theme Color
Namespace.Subtitle: Change the primary colors displayed in the application.

ColorScheme.Title: Preferred Color Scheme
ColorScheme.Subtitle: Toggle the application to use light theme or dark theme.

ScaleLevel.Title: Interface Scaling
ScaleLevel.Subtitle: Change the scale level of the interface in the application.

Font.Title: Interface Font
Font.Subtitle: Change the font of the interface in the application.
